alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 11:35AM MST until December 25 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Light wintry mix of light snow, light rain, and localized pockets of light freezing rain. Areas of black ice. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to black ice and light wintry precipitation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Many roadways and mountain passes remain slick.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
